trends: There have been 74 other sightings in St Louis
There were no other sightings in St Louis on or around September 3rd 2003
Summary: Two unmoving, vanishing disks over the skies of St
divs: Sighting Detailsi was driving home from school at about 4pm on westbound interstate 44 in stlouis in early september. there was a lot of traffic so i wasnt moving veryfast. i glanced up to the skies in the north and saw a thin, gray object in thesky. at first i thought it was an airplane but then i soon realized it was notmoving. completely stationary. after almost crashing because of my wonder, icorrected my course on the road. it was after i looked up the second time that isaw that not only was the first object in the same location it had been, therewas now an identical sliver of gray, possibly closer. both of which wereunmoving i assume this because i had moved on the highway, and the objects werenow out my pasenger window. still trying to watch and drive, i glanced back upagain and the second disk vanished. then about ten seconds later the originalobject vanished as well. the whole episode lasted about three minutes.
